# ExpandedWindowToolbarStyle

**Structure**

A window toolbar style which displays its title bar area above the toolbar.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ExpandedWindowToolbarStyle
```

## Overview

You can also use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/WindowToolbarStyle/expanded] to construct this style.

## Creating the window toolbar style

- **init()**: Creates an expanded window toolbar style.

## Supporting types

- **DefaultWindowToolbarStyle**: The default window toolbar style.
- **UnifiedWindowToolbarStyle**: A window toolbar style which displays its toolbar and title bar inline.
- **UnifiedCompactWindowToolbarStyle**: A window toolbar style similar to [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/WindowToolbarStyle/unified], but with a more compact vertical sizing.

## Conforms To

- WindowToolbarStyle
